DERP

BETA Testupload.
Hi fellow Game Tester

This version is made for an 960 x 600 Resolution, although its possible to play it in FULL Screen Mode.
Please tell me what you think of the game.
- What do you like?
- What sucks?
- What would be nice?
- What isn't working?
- Anything you want to tell me. =)

Please leave a Comment or write me on sebi@quarck.ch

Thanks for playing! and have FUN.
